titleStmt.title: His Maiesties message, sent the twentieth of May, MDCXLIII.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: Actual place of publication from Wing.
Expressing His Majesty's desire for peace, and demanding an answer to his message to Parliament of 12 April.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
